product_name: Stanley Classic Vacuum Food Jar - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: Keep your chili, chowder or chicken soup warm all day long with the Stanley Classic Vacuum food jar. Stainless-steel, BPA-free construction stands up to rough days on the trail and at the work site. Vacuum insulation keeps your food and beverages hot or cold for up to 15 hrs. Insulated lid doubles as a bowl. Leakproof stopper locks liquids inside. Stanley Classic Vacuum food jar has a wide-mouth opening that fits hearty stews; holds up to 24 fl. oz.
short_description: Keep your chili, chowder or chicken soup warm all day long with the Stanley Classic Vacuum food jar.
